name: Chicken Rice
description: Fragrant basmati rice stired with tender chicken pieces, fresh vegetables, and a blend of aromatic spices..

name: Egg Rice
description: Fluffy stir-fried rice tossed with scrambled eggs, scallions, and a hint of soy sauce.

name: Mixed Rice
description: A delicious combination of chicken, egg, and garden-fresh vegetables stir-fried with seasoned rice.

name: Chicken Kottu
description: A Sri Lankan street food classic made with shredded paratha, savory chicken curry, and crisp vegetables.

name: Cheese Kottu
description: A rich and creamy twist on the traditional kottu, loaded with melted cheese and aromatic spices.

name: Dolfin Kottu Special
description: Our signature creamy kottu, featuring a unique blend of spices, milk, and premium ingredients.

name: String Hopper Kottu
description: Shredded string hoppers stir-fried with fresh vegetables, egg, and your choice of spices.

name: Chicken Biriyani
description: Traditionally spiced long-grain rice served with succulent marinated chicken and a boiled egg.

name: Masala Biriyani
description: A spicy and flavorful rice dish infused with a rich masala blend and authentic Indian herbs.

name: Pork Biriyani
description: A hearty portion of spiced biriyani rice served with tender, slow-cooked pork in a rich gravy.

name: Biriyani Special
description: Our premium biriyani experience featuring extra portions of meat, cashew nuts, and specialty garnishes.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: A crispy crust topped with zesty tomato sauce, melted mozzarella, and generous slices of spicy pepperoni.

name: Margherita pizza
description: The classic Italian favorite with fresh tomato sauce, creamy mozzarella, and a touch of basil.

name: BBQ Chicken  Pizza
description: Tangy BBQ sauce topped with grilled chicken strips, red onions, and gooey melted cheese.

name: Cheese Pizza
description: A simple yet satisfying delight featuring a golden crust and a premium blend of four melted cheeses.

name: Beef Burgur
description: A juicy flame-grilled beef patty served in a toasted bun with fresh lettuce, tomato, and our secret sauce.

name: Cheese Burger
description: Our classic beef burger elevated with a thick slice of melted cheddar cheese.

name: Crispy chicken Burger
description: Golden-fried breaded chicken breast topped with cool mayo and crunchy lettuce.

name: Spicy BBQ Berger
description: A fiery grilled burger basted in spicy BBQ sauce and topped with jalapeños for an extra kick.

name: Vegan Bowl
description: A healthy and vibrant mix of fresh greens, grains, and seasonal vegetables with a light vinaigrette.

name: Watalappan
description: A traditional Sri Lankan coconut custard pudding sweetened with kithul jaggery and spiced with cardamom.

name: Chicken Soup
description: A warm, comforting bowl of clear broth with tender chicken bits and garden vegetables.

name: Soup Special
description: Our chef’s daily special soup, prepared with fresh ingredients and served with a side of bread.

name: Jelly Pudding
description: A light and refreshing chilled dessert featuring layers of fruit-flavored jelly and creamy custard.

name: Caramal Pudding
description: A silky-smooth steamed custard topped with a rich, golden caramel sauce.
